attributes.action: Inquire why only Christianity is not entitled to be tolerated.
attributes.background: Launch an inquiry as to why it is only Christianity that has no entitlement to tolerance in a historically Christian country. This is prejudice and should be as unacceptable as intolerance to other faiths.

rejection.details:
It is against the law (the Equality Act 2010) to discriminate against someone because of their religion. This includes Christianity. You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/discrimination-your-rights/types-of-discrimination
